===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -1,69 +1,85 @@
+// ecosystem.config.js
+// Run with: pm2 start ecosystem.config.js
+
 module.exports = {
-    apps: [
-        {
-            name: "node-main",
-            script: "apps/blockchain/server.js",
-            cwd: ".",
-            watch: false,
-            env: {
-                NODE_ENV: "production",
-                PORT: 3000,
-                P2P_PORT: 3001,
-            },
-            autorestart: true,
-            restart_delay: 2000,
-        },
-        {
-            name: "node-2",
-            script: "apps/blockchain/server.js",
-            cwd: ".",
-            watch: false,
-            env: {
-                NODE_ENV: "production",
-                PORT: 4000,
-                P2P_PORT: 4001,
-            },
-            autorestart: true,
-            restart_delay: 2000,
-        },
-        {
-            name: "miner-1",
-            script: "apps/miner/server.js",
-            args: "--address 4a3b1f2eexamplemineraddress",
-            cwd: ".",
-            watch: false,
-            env: {
-                NODE_ENV: "production",
-                NODE: "http://localhost:3000",
-            },
-            autorestart: true,
-            restart_delay: 3000,
-        },
-        {
-            name: "miner-2",
-            script: "apps/miner/server.js",
-            args: "--address 4a3b1f2eexamplemineraddress",
-            cwd: ".",
-            watch: false,
-            env: {
-                NODE_ENV: "production",
-                NODE: "http://localhost:3000",
-            },
-            autorestart: true,
-            restart_delay: 3000,
-        },
-        {
-            name: "scanner-web",
-            script: "apps/scanner/webserver.js",
-            cwd: ".",
-            watch: ["apps/scanner/public"],
-            env: {
-                NODE_ENV: "production",
-                NODE_URL: "http://localhost:3000",
-                SCANNER_PORT: 8080,
-            },
-            autorestart: true,
-            restart_delay: 2000,
-        },
-    ],
+  apps: [
+    // ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ üß± NODE 1 (Genesis Node) ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
+    {
+      name: "node-1",
+      script: "apps/blockchain/server.js",
+      cwd: ".",
+      watch: false,
+      env: {
+        NODE_ENV: "production",
+        PORT: 3000,
+        P2P_PORT: 3001,
+        // ŸÜŸàÿØ ÿßŸàŸÑ ÿ®ÿØŸàŸÜ peers (⁄òŸÜÿ≥€åÿ≥)
+        PEERS: "[]"
+      },
+      autorestart: true,
+      restart_delay: 2000,
+    },
+
+    // ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ üß± NODE 2 (Peer Node) ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
+    {
+      name: "node-2",
+      script: "apps/blockchain/server.js",
+      cwd: ".",
+      watch: false,
+      env: {
+        NODE_ENV: "production",
+        PORT: 4000,
+        P2P_PORT: 4001,
+        // ŸÜŸàÿØ ÿØŸàŸÖ ÿ®Ÿá ŸÜŸàÿØ ÿßŸàŸÑ ŸÖÿ™ÿµŸÑ ŸÖ€åÿ¥Ÿá
+        PEERS: '["ws://localhost:3001"]'
+      },
+      autorestart: true,
+      restart_delay: 2000,
+    },
+
+    // ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ ‚õèÔ∏è MINER 1 (Mining Node 1) ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
+    {
+      name: "miner-1",
+      script: "apps/miner/server.js",
+      args: "--address 4a3b1f2eexamplemineraddress1",
+      cwd: ".",
+      watch: false,
+      env: {
+        NODE_ENV: "production",
+        NODE: "http://localhost:3000"
+      },
+      autorestart: true,
+      restart_delay: 2000,
+    },
+
+    // ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ ‚õèÔ∏è MINER 2 (Mining Node 2) ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
+    {
+      name: "miner-2",
+      script: "apps/miner/server.js",
+      args: "--address 7b3c2dexamplemineraddress2",
+      cwd: ".",
+      watch: false,
+      env: {
+        NODE_ENV: "production",
+        NODE: "http://localhost:4000"
+      },
+      autorestart: true,
+      restart_delay: 2000,
+    },
+
+    // ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ üåç Web Scanner (Vue 3 UI) ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ‚îÄ
+    {
+      name: "scanner-web",
+      script: "apps/scanner/webserver.js",
+      cwd: ".",
+      watch: ["apps/scanner/public"],
+      env: {
+        NODE_ENV: "production",
+        NODE_URL: "http://localhost:3000",
+        SCANNER_PORT: 8080
+      },
+      autorestart: true,
+      restart_delay: 2000,
+    },
+  ],
 };
